releaseNotes:
- Added Android TV support with QR-based playlist sync and smart merging.

- Introduced a custom update system with changelog, progress, auto-retry, and architecture-specific APKs and many more...

- Team Netra

changelog.text: Added Android TV support with QR-based playlist sync and smart merging.
Introduced a custom update system with changelog, progress, auto-retry, and architecture-specific APKs.
Added big-picture notification images and landscape support for Party Room and Update Dialog.
Optimized queue updates, fixed player-stop logic, and ensured valid media URLs in search playback.
Implemented a sequential download queue to prevent memory issues and timeouts.

lockMessage: The app is temporarily locked for maintenance. Please check back later.
